info.name: Wajas - Prettier Caves
info.description: Takes the clutter of the new Wajas cave view and attempts to make it more aesthetically pleasing.
info.additionalInfo: Sadly, due to the page structure and the absolute nightmare of this new layout, I wasn't able to make it resemble the old cave style. But at least it won't have font sizes so large they could be billboards and an overall lack of symmetry.
